name: INF Parallel Type GateFamily: alphaclops.ops.common_gates.XPowGate
description:
Accepts
1. `alphaclops.Gate` instances `g` s.t. `isinstance(g, alphaclops.ops.common_gates.XPowGate)` OR
2. `alphaclops.ParallelGate` instance `g` s.t. `g.sub_gate` satisfies 1. and `alphaclops.num_qubits(g) <= INF` OR
3. `alphaclops.Operation` instance `op` s.t. `op.gate` satisfies 1. or 2.
